title: Acid dragon scales
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Name                                                           | Acid dragon scales |
| :------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| Size to wear                                                   | All                |
| [Armour Class](/Armour_class "Armour class")                   | 6                  |
| [Encumbrance rating](/Encumbrance_rating "Encumbrance rating") | 5                  |
| Maximum Enchantment                                            | +6                 |
| Grants                                                         | rCorr              |
| Time to Wear                                                   | 5                  |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The scales of an acid dragon. Although it does not provide its wearer with as much protection as the armour made from the scales of some larger dragons, it is somewhat lighter and less encumbering. It is also remarkably smooth, letting corrosive slime flow off it like water. |

**Acid dragon scales** are a lightweight armour that provides [corrosion resistance](/Corrosion_resistance "Corrosion resistance").

This item has a 33% chance to generate when you slay an [acid dragon](/Acid_dragon "Acid dragon").

## Desirability

An upgrade over plain [ring mails](/Ring_mail "Ring mail") and [scale mails](/Scale_mail "Scale mail"), acid dragon scales are very light. They are only 1 encumbrance above [leather armour](/Leather_armour "Leather armour"), so even if you have poor strength, they won't hinder you much. Overall, they are a nice choice for early casters and [EV](/EV "EV")-based characters. They are also useful for [Trolls](/Troll "Troll") and [Oni](/Oni "Oni") who haven't found anything heavier yet.

You might want to upgrade to the slightly heavier [swamp dragon scales](/Swamp_dragon_scales "Swamp dragon scales") once you can handle the encumbrance.

Corrosion resistance is useful in the [Slime Pits](/Slime_Pits "Slime Pits"), and against certain enemies like [entropy weavers](/Entropy_weaver "Entropy weaver"). But if you're a heavy melee character, don't wear this armour *just* for the resistance. The loss in AC is not worth having rCorr.

## History

- Acid dragon scales were introduced in [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), replacing [mottled dragon scales](/Mottled_dragon_scales "Mottled dragon scales").

html:
Acid dragon scales

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Acid dragon scales
Size to wear All
Armour Class 6
Encumbrance rating 5
Maximum Enchantment +6
Grants rCorr
Time to Wear 5


The scales of an acid dragon. Although it does not provide its wearer with as much protection as the armour made from the scales of some larger dragons, it is somewhat lighter and less encumbering. It is also remarkably smooth, letting corrosive slime flow off it like water.

Acid dragon scales are a lightweight armour that provides corrosion resistance.

This item has a 33% chance to generate when you slay an acid dragon.

Desirability

An upgrade over plain ring mails and scale mails, acid dragon scales are very light. They are only 1 encumbrance above leather armour, so even if you have poor strength, they won't hinder you much. Overall, they are a nice choice for early casters and EV-based characters. They are also useful for Trolls and Oni who haven't found anything heavier yet.

You might want to upgrade to the slightly heavier swamp dragon scales once you can handle the encumbrance.

Corrosion resistance is useful in the Slime Pits, and against certain enemies like entropy weavers. But if you're a heavy melee character, don't wear this armour just for the resistance. The loss in AC is not worth having rCorr.

History

  • Acid dragon scales were introduced in 0.20, replacing mottled dragon scales.

'''Acid dragon scales''' are a lightweight armour that provides [[corrosion resistance]].

This item has a 33% chance to generate when you slay an [[acid dragon]].

==Desirability==
An upgrade over plain [[ring mail]]s and [[scale mail]]s, acid dragon scales are very light. They are only 1 encumbrance above [[leather armour]], so even if you have poor strength, they won't hinder you much. Overall, they are a nice choice for early casters and [[EV]]-based characters. They are also useful for [[Troll]]s and [[Oni]] who haven't found anything heavier yet. 

You might want to upgrade to the slightly heavier [[swamp dragon scales]] once you can handle the encumbrance.

Corrosion resistance is useful in the [[Slime Pits]], and against certain enemies like [[entropy weaver]]s. But if you're a heavy melee character, don't wear this armour ''just'' for the resistance. The loss in AC is not worth having rCorr.

==History==
*Acid dragon scales were introduced in [[0.20]], replacing [[mottled dragon scales]].
